Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Addison
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Addison due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Addison due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
